text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @FoxNews You are a clown and you are letting those around you make a bigger fool of you. Try getting some people around you who are going to tell you the truth and again the next time you play clips for a briefing for COVID-19 make sure to add the ones where you called this a hoax
